desired.name: good first issue
desired.description: Denotes an issue ready for a new contributor.

desired.name: help wanted
desired.description: Denotes an issue that needs help from a contributor.

desired.name: kind/bug
desired.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.

desired.name: kind/cleanup
desired.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to cleaning up code, process, or technical debt.

desired.name: kind/documentation
desired.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to documentation.

desired.name: kind/feature
desired.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a new feature.

desired.name: kind/support
desired.description: Categorizes issue or PR as a support question.

desired.name: lifecycle/rotten
desired.description: Denotes an issue or PR that has aged beyond stale and will be auto-closed.

desired.name: lifecycle/stale
desired.description: Denotes an issue or PR has remained open with no activity and has become stale.

desired.name: lifecycle/frozen
desired.description: Indicates that an issue or PR should not be auto-closed due to staleness.

desired.name: needs-triage
desired.description: Indicates an issue or PR lacks a `triage/foo` label and requires one.

desired.name: priority/awaiting-more-evidence
desired.description: Lowest priority. Possibly useful, but not yet enough support to actually get it done.

desired.name: priority/backlog
desired.description: Higher priority than priority/awaiting-more-evidence.

desired.name: priority/important-longterm
desired.description: Important over the long term, but may not be staffed and/or may need multiple releases to complete.

desired.name: priority/important-soon
desired.description: Must be staffed and worked on either currently, or very soon, ideally in time for the next release.

desired.name: priority/critical-urgent
desired.description: Highest priority. Must be actively worked on as someone's top priority right now.

desired.name: triage/accepted
desired.description: Indicates an issue or PR is ready to be actively worked on.

desired.name: triage/duplicate
desired.description: Indicates an issue is a duplicate of other open issue.

desired.name: triage/needs-information
desired.description: Indicates an issue needs more information in order to work on it.

desired.name: triage/not-reproducible
desired.description: Indicates an issue can not be reproduced as described.

desired.name: triage/unresolved
desired.description: Indicates an issue that can not or will not be resolved.
